My previous/other TV is also a Sammy that I'm very pleased with, but it's a 56" DLP rear projection.  The clarity and color of this TV is amazing.  I went to local retailers before purchasing this and compared it with many other TV's keeping in mind that the settings they had may not have been optimal.  There were other TV's that looked pretty good that may have been a little cheaper, but no matter which store I checked out, the Samsungs always looked great so I ultimately decided to go with this one.  To top it off, I was able to get a returned one from Amazon Warehouse details that said the back had minor surface damage.  I got this several months ago and I honestly don't even remember where the imperfection was supposed to be so this turned out to be a great deal for me.  I still haven't hooked it up to my surround system, so I've been watching it with the TV's speakers which get the job done.  It has plenty of connectivity, the menu is pretty easy to navigate, and I honestly haven't used the remote too much after I initially set everything up.  The viewing angle is pretty much a non-factor, the blacks are deep and the whites are bright.  In comparison to another brand at my parents' house, the image is much better in my opinion as the picture seems true to the film and color.  With the one at my parents' house, it is very clear, but something is a little off making it appear to be almost home-video like or even a little 3d whereas with this Samsung I get crystal clear HD and it feels like I'm watching what I'm supposed to be watching, i.e. a movie or TV.  (That may not make sense unless you've experienced what I'm describing.)  Finally, I've used it for a little bit of gaming and all of the above picture quality holds true there as well.Bottom Line: It costs a tad more than some other brands, but you're getting a product with a much higher guarantee of quality in my opinion.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming
Reviews.Author: Ariana Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I bought this television a while back and really enjoy it. It's a great set. It may not have the sharpest picture out there, especially when watching cable, but it's more than enough for the price. My kids and husband love it and they think the quality of the picture for gaming is great.

Reviews.Title: Speedo
Reviews.Author: Speed
Reviews.Content: Have it now over 6 months and TV works great. Great price. No problems and decent sound for a flat panel. Delivery was handled very well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: jane holland
Reviews.Content: After much internet and store searching I purchased this TV as well as a Samsung 37" from Amazon for a second home we just purchased. Both TV's arrived in just a few days.  They were easy to set up out of the box, hook up and the remote is very user friendly, especially for two 'electronically challenged' people like my husband and I.  The picture is sharp and clear, volume is clear.  My only wish is that they had the ability to lower volume automatically when those loud commercials come on. All in all we are very pleased and went back and ordered a 32" TCL for our guest room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Sweeper
Reviews.Content: This is our first bedroom television. Although we do not use it much, the 46" Samsung LCD was a great choice. As expected, the picture quality is outstanding. The speedy delivery and great price made Amazon the obvious choice. I also found tree reviews helpful in making my choice. A 46" Samsung LED in the study is our primary television. I see little difference.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: ElijahLukeH
Reviews.Content: Just now getting our first flat screen wide screen TV, so, I may not be "qualified" to write a review.  But just know that this TV is awesome - great clear picture, easy to change brightness settings ("P.Mode" on the remote), very attractive (my wife picked out this 'style' at wal-mart, but I got the right specs and price on Amazon), and so far (purchased 1 month ago) no issues.  I almost set it on the stand backwards because the stand set-up instruction pictures aren't very good (it is also probably clear to the average American, but I'm below-average).  The sound quality on the TV itself probably isn't very good, I very quickly set it to my Sony sound system and I'm sure most home-entertainment people buying this type of TV are using optical audio to connect it to a home theatre sound system.  Overall - very pleased, great quality, great picture, bought the warranty and we'll see how it goes!

Reviews.Title: awesome TV
Reviews.Author: robbiee2000
Reviews.Content: We went from a 20" TV to this monster and have been blown away; purchasing on Amazon saved us almost $200 from the cheapest store purchased set.  Awesome picture, features and functioning.  We are not big tech, big gamers or big movie folks so it fits us just fine; excellent HD quality.  Very happy we chose this over the Plasma competitors.  Plenty of connection portsOverall, very happy

Reviews.Title: I feel that this tv is really good.
Reviews.Author: Abel Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Just know that if you don't have HD channels from your cable provider, then you're going to dislike the image.This applies to all hdtvs. Not just this one.I love how bright it is. It was easy to install. (I installed the wall hanger crooked the first time......my bad).It doesn't get too hot. I love it.The sound is a bit hollow, but no tv's are meant to be enjoyed without a sound system. Just buy some Dell computer Speakers on eBay for $20, and you're good to go with good bass.Samsung to me, is a reliable brand. I believe they account for all their mistakes, if any.This tv has revived my gaming years, I love playing rock band and other games without squinting at the small tv I used to have before this.My parents love it, (they didn't pay for it).You'll love this TV if you appreciate all the good things in life.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Joel Sabadell "Rigid thoughts"
Reviews.Content: I understand why other reviewers would complain about thr TV Speaker, but i have a home theater system so that did not bother me so much. Other than that, everything else works great! Very easy to set up, it took about 15 minutes to get everything plugged in and connected to my computer and to my stereo. The picture is very clear, visual appeal is fantastic, and It is one of the best TV i have ever used and even my friends compliment on it. If you have a home theater system and do not have to rely on the TV speakers. This is definitely a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price Point
Reviews.Author: PhotonicsMan
Reviews.Content: This television is an excellent value for the price.  Having been a part in the purchase of 3 of these, product reliability has never been a problem.  Obviously, if you are looking for the best possible image, this screen cannot provide the contrast level and truly deep blacks provided by top-of-the-line equipment.  Nonetheless, for the average viewer the screen quality is excellent.- The sound is, like that of any television, lacking.  Even a low-end sound system would fare better than the built in speakers.  Though less discerning ears seem to deem the speakers acceptable.- Minimal setup is required, but the design of the base and screen is both sleek and sturdy.- The power cable on the back of this model tends to have some trouble staying in at times, so install accordingly.- Lastly, take the time to tune the image.  Out of the box, this model lacks the details in the shadows necessary to enjoy darker movies.  However, the customizability of the image is excellent for a TV at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: T. Ruginis "angryCutlet"
Reviews.Content: Arrived a day early with 2 day shipping from amazon :) The TV is great. A little bit of a light bleed at bottom two corners but it's so minor that it took me a while to even notice and only occurs when switching from sources. For the prices this is a great TV! Looks sexy with that glass trim around it. Oh and also, the stand spins and is made of, what looks like, solid glass which is much better than some plasticy static stand from my previous panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV, but with a catch...
Reviews.Author: Jesse Hudgens
Reviews.Content: I want to start by saying that this TV is an amazing deal for the price. In my opinion, this set hits the sweet spot of the HDTV technology without venturing too far into things like the 3D gimmick that some worry will fade with time. The picture settings will need to be tweaked out of the box for the best image, but a quick search online will give you some suggested settings that generate a near perfect result.So...why 4 stars? The Auto Motion Plus Stutter.I am not a user who will complain about the "Soap Opera Effect," if anything, I actually like the feature and it was a factor in purchasing the TV. However, consumers should note that some TV's being delivered are experiencing a "stutter" or dropped frames when using the Auto Motion Plus feature. My TV happens to be one of those with this issue. The only time I don't see this issue is when using AMP with my blu-ray player (I have 3 sources that produce a stutter ---> Game Console, Cable TV, and Computer HDMI out). What I have been told by some is that the stutter occurs because some sources are "compressed" or are not strong enough for the AMP chip to process. To me, this would be OK if Samsung acknowledged the issue up front. But what makes the whole thing questionable is that many users are not having a problem with their TV. Cable? Smooth. Game Console? Smooth. Computer HDMI? Smooth. To me this discrepancy among models indicates an error with the TV and not the source. Some even claim the stutter only started AFTER updating the firmware on the TV. Sketchy much? I hope to do some more testing in a week when I receive my HD-DVR.If you Google "auto motion plus stutter" you will find countless threads and reports of various models having the issue. If you try to contact Samsung, like I did, you will get the run-around."It must be the source.""Try turning the feature off and see if stutters" (which of course it won't, but the point is I want the feature on)."Auto Motion Plus is recommended for 24hrz and not 60hrz" (where do they advertise this?)This is a known issue for Samsung, and they have refused to acknowledge it for all of the owners of 2008-2010 TV's. Unfortunately as warranties expire, the company will ultimately move on and fail to address the issue for those unlucky enough to be caught with one of these defective sets. Right now it appears no fix is in the works and won't be.So now... after all that complaining...why 4 stars and not 1? Because, the TV is still amazing. As a matter of fact, most people don't even like the AMP feature because of it's over-smooth movement. Though I am upset the feature doesn't work properly on mine, it is not a deal breaker by any means. I highly recommend this TV for it's picture quality and price alone - and if your AMP works then it is the cherry on top.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with LCD TV and Delivery
Reviews.Author: S. DiGiulio "TypicalDad"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from an Amazon vendor in "Used - Like New" condition and TV arrived in great shape and packaged like it was brand new.  Set up TV without much effort, and eventually bought and connected a HDMI cable for the cable box to the TV.  Ensure the cable is HDMI version 1.4 or HDMI with Ethernet.  Picture is great, especially when TV broadcast is HD.  I only paid slightly over $600 which included shipping cost for Samsung 46" LCD TV.  That's a bargain!  I don't need LED or 3D TV at all, this LCD one is marvelous.  The picture was slightly flawed so I adjusted the judder setting and blur reduction setting and now picture is fine.  Also, I have an old rear project 65" Toshiba TV and the picture on the Samsung is much brighter (in standard mode) which actually prompted me to brighten and improve the Toshiba picture! A great second TV!

Reviews.Title: service from video and audio center
Reviews.Author: ppammyannie
Reviews.Content: i placed an order by error for a very expensive tv.  i called the video and audio center, after being directed there by the amazon staff.  both were very understanding and accommodating about stopping my order. very happy with the service and attitude everyone gave me and plan to use amazon when i do order my new tv by the end of the month.ppammyannie

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: uncleduke
Reviews.Content: This HDTV is the first one I have bought.  I was able to take it out of the box and set it up with the cable box, surround sound, Roku player and wireless card within two hours with the help of my son-in-law.  I am very happy with the quality and sharpness of the picture.  I am glad I got the blue ray surround sound since the sound quality on the set could be improved.  The system seems easy to operate and the set up was easy to follow with the instructions provided.  I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630
Reviews.Author: scoop123
Reviews.Content: It came on time; it works as advertised; it's easy to use except for setting up the Comcast remote with the Samsung codes. It requires some user adjustment to get the sharpness and user inputs right but it is an intuitive interface so you can pretty much do the menu without needing the manual. Overall, very satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: EB
Reviews.Content: Great TVPicture is awesome very easy to setup with more inputs then I need at this point but good for the future. Only thing I don't know about is the Speakers I have it set up with a sound system so can't comment on that. Delivery was very quick. Great Buy

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Markus Egger "www.MarkusEgger.com/blog"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung HDTV and I got it because I was very satisfied with the first one I got (and still have). It isn't a super-expensive TV and for that, it provides excellent quality. I also like all the features it has. And all the input it supports. Not only does it have enough inputs for all the different appliances, gaming consoles, and other stuff you might want to hook up, but I really like the network support it has. I just plugged in a network cable, and voila: It found my home server and other computers that had shared media, and I can now directly access it from the TV. Very nice!

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Alla S.
Reviews.Content: I am generally a fan of Samsung--I have three of them in my house. This specific model is satisfactory for me, though some things could be improved. The owner instructions manual wasn't very good.Sound is fine, but if you're looking for the best quality sound, you would need to buy a good surround sound system (this is especially relevant when you're watching a movie and want to get a movie-theater feel).The standard definition image isn't that great. The picture quality isn't better than a lower cost Samsung model, such as 720p. The picture quality is nice with an HD signal.While the design is modern, I would have preferred a lighter color than charcoal--like gray or silver for instance. i prefer to use the remote control, since the touch screen button on the bottom front panel could have been done better. It's hard to see, and is not as comfortable to use when I'm turning the TV on or adjusting the volume for instance.Whenever I change the contrast settings, the TV tends to later return to its default level 100 max. In other words, my changes aren't saved and I have to re-set the contrast again later. It must also be noted that the menu itself is a little bit complex.When I switch the source of signal from my dvd player to the TV, using the menu, it tends to take a little longer--something like thirty seconds to a minute.I like to use the PIP function, but it's not on the remote control and is only included on the menu.The picture quality is great when you're viewing the Tv from a straight angle, but isn't as good when you're watching the TV from an angular angle--like 20 or 25 degrees angles. the picture tends to become dim.Some of the pros:Modern designPicture and sound qualityECO sensorBacklit RemoteSwivel stand includedPlenty of inputSome of the cons (could be improved):Sound is good, but isn't the bestPicture is nice only with HD signal and max contrast settingsNot all buttons light up on the backlit remotethe Input/output is not for all older devicesSwivel stand is not stableMenu is a bit complicated to navigateNot full PIP functionDespite everything, I would feel comfortable recommending this TV to others, who are looking for a big flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Great value. Beautiful picture and the sound is surprisingly decent - good to have while waiting to buy speaker system.

Reviews.Title: Samsung ln46c630
Reviews.Author: Mr. Nicholas J. Gravina
Reviews.Content: What a deal!  Easy set up, great picture and sound. Delivered on time in perfect condition. Hooked it up to a Bluray. DVD will never be the same. Why did I wait so long to get this LCD?Totally wonderful package.

Reviews.Title: Love my TV
Reviews.Author: S1500
Reviews.Content: I had a Sylvania 26 inch tv before this. Decided to take the plunge. Originally, I was going to get the $200 cheaper model without so many features, but it was out of stock. Got this one instead, and never looked back.I love the fact I can browse to my Linux server, or any of my Windows systems & play media right off that, or even a thumbdrive. That negates having to fire up the Xbox.The picture quality is beautiful, and yes, I do get the default "soap opera" effect, but I guess I'm just a config change away from fixing that. Gaming is much more fun with this & watching YouTube videos right on the screen is wonderful.Oh, that Comcast remote you have? Yeah, it works with it. Nothing's more convenient than being able to switch inputs with it(hit TV/VCR, than use arrow buttons) instead of fiddling with the native remote.While I don't like the lack of S-video with it, I got around it by just buying PS3 component cables for my PS2, and I was back in business. A quick trade of my Comcast HD box for the smaller HDMI model, and hey, I can use HDMI with it instead of component cables.It's priced right, it looks beautiful & I will never look back.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: jhous "jhous"
Reviews.Content: I haven't really found a down side to this TV .  With the proper HD source, the picture is stunning; maybe even too good.  Some actresses and some old movies are not meant to be seen with such high quality detail.  Setup was easy. As with any other quality TV, You just plug in the signal source(s) and tell the TV to find the channels; it did a good job.  The audio quality is good.  It does not have a megabuck surround sound system, do not compare it to such.  It is sound from relatively small, high quality TV speakers.  There is a remarkable amount of sound "tailoring" that you can do with the set up that makes it work well in a living room.I find no "blurring" in action scenes.  Any picture quality problems are a product of the source material not the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: solotex55
Reviews.Content: I did alot of research before buying the Samsung. I believe I got the best HDTV on the market fot the price. I already had a 32" Samsung 350 series, so was not suprised by anything on the 46", except how great the larger size was.The only sugestion I have is check-out the basic picture settings you can find online. These made a real difference in getting the picture quality at its best. You may stillneed to tweak your brightness and such, but they will definitely get you close to perfect.I did give the sound only 3 stars...it is weak. But I use the anlog output from my U-verse receiver for audio, so no big deal.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup, solid picture clarity. Very strong appeal even when compared to more expensive televisions. Looks great in any room.

Reviews.Title: ME LIKE
Reviews.Author: Joshua Kinch
Reviews.Content: Amazon great.Went out of their way to ship pronto when a backorder came up. Took a little learning to get the picture away from the deep blacks it is capable of. Once we got the brightness/contrast figured out, it seems like a great set, especially for the money. Would recommend to anyone looking in this price/size range.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD so far!!!
Reviews.Author: Jules W
Reviews.Content: This is my second 46 inch Samsung LCD, with the first one still have it and works great with only one minus problem after a year, the screen went blank and had to be replaced, thanks god I purchased the extended warranty. Still love all samsung products and that's why I purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: T..rap
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV about 2 weeks ago and I can't believe how good the picture is.  My wife and I feel like we have never watched TV before, every time we put in a blu ray in.  Other than the picture I really like the clean look of the TV.  The clear lining on the outside of the TV, and the touch buttons on the front of the TV.  I like that the TV stand allows it to move back and forth.The bad(if you can call it bad)The remote doesn't allow you to program it to my satellite(dish) and it doesn't have the red light on the bottom of it like the C610 series.Other than that this is a great TV I would buy it again. Especially for this price( I paid 900 for it )

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD TV
Reviews.Author: Alley Oop
Reviews.Content: So far everything has worked as expected. Only been in service for about a month.Price from Amazon beat all local stores and saved sales tax along with free delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas L. Koehler
Reviews.Content: After extensively researching televisions and reading too many reviews for my own good I settled on this Samsung unit.  I couldn't be more pleased with the picture, styling and overall features.  Set up was quite easy and further setting modifications is quick.  The only negative comments would be that this model doesn't have onboard Netflix access (although I can use my PS3 or stream it via HDMI) and as a whole found the Clear Motion Technology to be very artifial and unwanted.  The "soap opera effect" was far too prevalent in movies and made things look fake and distracting.  That being said I'm sure it has great application with sports although as someone who doesn't subscribe to cable I have yet to make that determination.  Overall I couldn't be happier with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Law
Reviews.Content: We researched a lot of LCD and LED tvs before making the decision to purchase this one. We have 2 additional Samsung LCD tvs (a 52" and 32"), so we are kind of partial to them, but we kept an open mind to other brands. Went to Best Buy to check out the picture on this model, and it was great! The price is the same as Best Buy (while it is on sale there), but at least you save on the taxes. Arrived yesterday and we hooked it up! Beautiful picture! I do agree with other comments on here that the sound isn't the best, but it isn't bad either. We are very happy with our decision! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: C. M. Rowell
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price (~700). I may be easily impressed after coming from an early-model big high-def projection tv, but I was amazed at how well this tv handles standard tv and old dvd's. Hi-def picture is great, of course. It could maybe use some more preset picture modes since the ones available aren't perfect for our room, but I'm sure we can tweak those settings manually. The samsung media server that connects the tv to our computers via your LAN is slow and doesn't recognize a lot of files, but that isn't really an issue with the tv. They just need to improve that software. Might try the Windows media server instead. I didn't even know the tv had that capability when we bought it and it is still nice to have. Even better is the ability to connect your computer to the tv directly for watching netflix and hulu. Goodbye cable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent so far
Reviews.Author: Cedric
Reviews.Content: I've only had this TV for about a week. I got it from the Amazon Marketplace used-like new. I was looking at plasmas but I was really afraid about burn-in. So far, it's just an excellent TV. I read about some people complaining about the sound, but I haven't had an issue with that. For normal everyday use, the sound is quite alright. I'll do an update late to decide if my opinion is still the same.

Reviews.Title: Love my T.V.!
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen, HDTV, so I don't have much to compare it to. We have had our T.V. for about a month now and we are loving it. The picture and the sound are great. We had it set up in about 20 minutes or so. Super easy.Happy Shopping!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price! Would have paid more for the TV!
Reviews.Author: AD
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong with this LCD TV. The clarity, and size is perfect! Samsung is the way to go for sure!

Reviews.Title: Crisp, clear, future ready
Reviews.Author: oldneverslow
Reviews.Content: The inside delivery and opening of the package was appreciated. We powered it up and began using the remote to set up and it was easy. I don't have a Surround Sound System so the sound quality through the stereo was bad. Once that was changed from SRS to standard audio, it sounds good. The speakers on the TV are mediocre, but typical for big screens. A SRS is next.Two visitors who own other brand LCDs, were here over the holidays. They thought it was an LED because the picture is so crisp and clear. (Better than theirs)I wanted the DLNA feature for network connection and sharing media from my PC. You have to download the Samsung PC Share Manager software and install it on your PC. The TV automatically finds the PC and it shows as a choice of SOURCE's. It does have limited access to PC file types, but the quality of the ones it displays is awesome.This is a great display and it has future technology built in. I want one for the bedroom, one for the RV, one for.....

Reviews.Title: Samsung Quality
Reviews.Author: C. Varney
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd Samsung LCD TV and we are very pleased with both TVs.  The TV picture quality has been fantastic and XBOX games look unbelievable on the the screen.  Despite the reviews, we have no issues with the sound. We thought about the LED, but I could not justify spending another $300.  You will be very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tina Pruett
Reviews.Content: I should start by mentioning that this is my first HDTV. I long resisted getting a HDTV because I couldn't justify spending so much money when my Sony Trinitron TV still worked and had good picture. Of course, by comparison, the Samsung blows my old TV away. It takes a while to get used to how vivid and sharp the picture is. Watching movies I've seen hundreds of times, and TV shows I've watched for years, it still amazes me what a difference the technology makes.We mounted this on the wall with a fully articulating Cheetah Mount, also bought on Amazon, and it's great to be able to swing the TV around to watch from the kitchen or the living room. I'm not an expert on TVs, but for your average consumer, this is a great TV. I also got a great deal by shopping through amazon. Not only was the base price $50 cheaper than any local stores, but the free delivery and no sales tax really makes a big difference when purchasing a big ticket item. Amazon's 24 months of deferred interest also beat out Best Buy's 18 months.Delivery was on time, and easy. I wasn't home, but my boyfriend said the delivery guys were polite and professional, which is about all you can ask for. The TV was in perfect condition when delivered, which I had been somewhat worried about, but it was probably transported better than I would have been able to do in my own vehicle had we bought from Best Buy or somewher else.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Neil Waligora
Reviews.Content: this tv is well worth the buy. all the good reviews about this tv are well said. best tv for the price

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Sandy Pine Paul
Reviews.Content: After reading several reviews, it was a cinch to set up the tv to obtain proper viewing details.  The set has been in operation from day one without any negative aspects.  I made a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Pam881
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv about a month ago.  I love it!! I have had a 26" console tv since 1990 and moved to NC in October.  We have the tv hung over our fireplace and it looks fantastic.  When we watch an HD station the people look like they are right in the room with us.  Couldn't be better.  I'm sure I could get a sound bar for better clarity, but I am happy with it just the way it is.  I highly recommend this model and the price was fair at $799.00  The delivery people from Amazon were great too.  They waited until we got it out of the box and checked it for damage before they left. I give Amazon and Samsung my highest praise.

Reviews.Title: A great TV
Reviews.Author: Glenn Franklin "uncleben"
Reviews.Content: This was my 2nd Samsung TV purchase from Amazon.com.  Very happy with the pricing, delivery time, courtesy of the delivery men.  The TV works as described, and is a beautiful set.

Reviews.Title: perfect size, perfect tv
Reviews.Author: S. Das
Reviews.Content: Great price at amazon, great service (the guy installed it), great picture. I hooked on my home theatre system - now its a perfect solution

Reviews.Title: 3 years later still going strong
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Samsung truly makes high quality tv's. It's been 3 years but this is still clear as the day purchased and has never given me any issues. And with the firmware update, I can play nearly all video formats through the USB port. If you can grab this used at this point at a good price, you should definitely go for it.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far
Reviews.Author: J.S.
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this TV so far. Sharp image with pleasing colors. I've turned off the "standard" picture mode--it looked too much like a soap opera--and use either the "Clear" or "Custom" modes. It does a nice job with SD images too. Paired with a Blu-ray it's especially good.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv!
Reviews.Author: Suzy B
Reviews.Content: Buying this tv from Amazon was a great experience.  It was delivered and set up in our home and made sure that it was in working order, before the delivery personnel left.  The tv itself has a beautiful picture and sound.  We couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: happy with this tv
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with this TV, and the delivery process was smooth. The HD picture is very nice, and its off-the-air digital tuner works very well. Its handling of old AV input (VCR) is better than I expected. I've gotten very good results with 1080i inputs from the component video input. It's a very attractive product.Samsung should do better with their support for streaming movies from a PC over the Ethernet LAN port. With no ability to rewind or fastforward, and PC server software that doesn't feel that high quality, it's not a good solution. They should stick to just advertising it as a TV until the file streaming function really is attractive and usable.The shortcomings of file streaming are documented in the user manual so I was not disappointed by them. Overall it's a very good TV and it's impressive this type of product is available for such a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Love Samsungs
Reviews.Author: Blackmag17
Reviews.Content: This is my second LCD from Samsung. I read a lot of reviews for a few months before I made my decision on what to buy, and Samsung LCD's were consistently in the top 3 best TV's. Yes, there are better 46" TV's out there, particularly the LG 47LH90, but for the price the Samsung cannot be beat. It's between $300-$500 cheaper than the LG. Picture quality is good right out of the box, but it gets even better if you use a picture set up disc, like DVE on blu-ray. My only complaints are the remote, I don't like how some of the most used buttons are placed, and the speakers, which could be a little better. TV is a great buy from argubaly the best LCD manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent upgrade
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Berkowitz "Sports junkie"
Reviews.Content: I recently moved and hadn't bought anything for myself in a quite a while, so I did. The picture on this TV is phenomenal. In fact, some of the pictures even look as if I'm watching the show in 3D they're so good. Best upgrade I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630 46' LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Red Brave
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my purchase.  The picture quality is fantastic and you can really see the difference when you flip back and forth from HD to non-HD programming (HD is especially great for sports that have good colors, golf and football for example).  The delivery was quick and setup by CEVA was pretty good, as they de-box and install it to show you the blue screen.

Reviews.Title: Samsug
Reviews.Author: Joseph Enriquez
Reviews.Content: This Flat Screen is a very nice TV. The sound is good, the picture is nice and the whole appearance of the TV and the stand looks good.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Bryan Nitz
Reviews.Content: This TV's awesome! I tried an LG 42LH40 and a Sony 46EX400 and I didn't like either. This TV blows them away! The colors are beautiful, the picture is sharp, the blacks are very good for an LCD, and viewing angles are pretty good. The sound is pretty impressive for a flat panel TV as well. This TV has a simplistic yet very good looking design, i'm glad it doesn't have that ugly red touch of color on it. The TV is very well built, all the parts on it seem like they're really high quality, the back of the TV is even made of metal instead of plastic and the stand is glass. The LG I had seemed really cheaply made and the stand was really generic and wobbly. I can't comment on the Auto Motion Plus as i'm not a big fan of image interpolation software. I highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a TV in the $900-$1200 price range.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Billy Adkins "Electro-geek"
Reviews.Content: I've owned this television for two weeks now and I love it. The HDMI-CEC works seamlessly with my PS3, the picture quality is great(usually is on a Samsung), it networks well with my computer and plays my media without staggering, it's pretty, and was easy to set up and assemble. The remote is good has alot of features and doesn't feel cheap. I couldn't recommend this more to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV for the Price
Reviews.Author: HL7 Tech
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this 120 HZ TV is excellent.  Anyone looking for a great looking TV with good connectivity will not be disappointed.  The ability to stream network media is a plus.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Kreig Kaufman "katfish27"
Reviews.Content: Awesome television for the price. Easy to setup . Plug In Play baby ! Your televsion receiver/cable box will make a BIG difference. Not all stations come through with HD.

Reviews.Title: Just ok.
Reviews.Author: M. Hiner "wvshopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product in April 2010 from Amazon.  My first TV of this kind.  At that time the price was the exact same as Sears(checked model #) and shipping was Free on Amazon, so I ordered from Amazon.  CEVA shipping was Fast and GREAT.Took me a while to get used to this.THanks to a previous reviewer, I knew what to do when the room got dark so does the picture (stupid idea); but TBone from CA provided the answer for that turn off the Eco Picture and that solves that problem.I thought the TV had auto adjust volumn, still have not figured that out.  After reading a review, I might have to go back into the settings.The volumn is poor as speakers are in the back, I do not have or plan to have surround sound, so this is a negative for me.  Had I realized this I would have bought a different brand with the speakers in front, of which, now I realize there are plenty of them out there.I am sure this is a good tv for some, but it does not impress me.FOund the settings very hard to get thru and set.

Reviews.Title: vertical line in the middle after two months
Reviews.Author: gardenState123
Reviews.Content: After a short two months, a vertical line appeared in the middle of the screen. Since it has already passed Amazon's return date, I had to call samsung's tech support. Waiting for the repair people to call me now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Bad Delivery
Reviews.Author: R. Roll
Reviews.Content: Samsung TV is great and a good value.  The one problem that I had is that for some reason the TV occasionally interferes with  the remote for my AT&T; U-Verse cable box.  That's the good news.  The bad news is that the delivery was awful.  The TV came over a week later than scheduled.  The "white glove" delivery was a disappointment.  They were supposed to unbox, set-up and connect the TV.  They were going to leave without doing this until I stopped them and asked them to do it.  then they did.

Reviews.Title: Saved over $70 and order was shipped for Free!
Reviews.Author: Oscar "electronic junky"
Reviews.Content: I just can't get over how good this set is! Looking at the LN40C630 at my local store it was just amazing. I am a really big fan of Sony but this set blew me away. The black level is just as good as any Sony they had on display and being 120hz the set had no motion issues at all. Not sure about 3D and if you're not into spending a lot of cash check out the LN40C630. If your looking for a set for your bedroom or your living room this is the perfect set. Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: famlars
Reviews.Content: This is a solid TV. Our first one from Amazon was broken when we pulled it out of the box (no picture at all), which was disconcerting, but the replacement we received works nicely.Very good picture. Easy to set up. Fairly lightweight. Not as thin as LED TVs, but not bad. I couldn't be happier about these things.I've been having some trouble getting a good signal with my antenna. It's unusable at this point for over-the-air TV, so I'm going to have to try a new antenna. When I change channels it is very slow. Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the ease of ordering and the delivery of this Samsung LCD TV.  I purchased this LCD TV based on its "best buy" rating by Consumer Reports. Reviews.Content: Not much of a techie but I did a lot of research before buying this TV (I also bought it through Amazon warehouse deals, which saved me a few extra bucks). Reviews.Content: First thing i thought when i saw the tv is goodness gracious that is a frickin huge box the size of the tv is perfect you dont need anything bigger. The picture that came out of it was amazing, i got avatar on bluray and it was amazing so clear. This tv has so many inputs you could never fill them all. Reviews.Title: Beware the Samsung Flicker!
Reviews.Author: a reader in Calif
Reviews.Content: You can benefit from my experience. Before purchasing, google "Samsung flicker" or "Samsung capacitors" (in each case, without the quotes). There is a lot of information on the Internet indicating that Samsung's off-shore manufacturers have used faulty capacitors in their unit power supply--apparently this problem affects both Samsung TV's and monitors. When this happens, you will not notice anything wrong at first, as it takes the capacitors time to fail (google "capacitor plague") but when they start failing you will experience flickering and dimness at first and can expect this to get worse over time and for the unit to finally completely fail.If you are lucky, you will have problems while the unit is still under warranty. However, the replacement unit you receive may have the same problems, and when it fails will almost certainly be out of warranty.My experience: Samsung replaced my unit on warranty, but the replacement unit they sent me failed (with the issues described) shortly afterwards and was "out of warranty." While I didn't expect much I did call Samsung customer service to see if they had any program to address this. They do not. Once the warranty is over, you're on your own. At the price they quoted it really isn't worth fixing it, so it looks like I'm stuck with a very expensive paperweight. May you make better decisions and have better luck in your purchase!

Reviews.Content: Let me start by expressing my disgust with morons that gave this product anything under 3 stars. Reviews.Author: DJ HERE
Reviews.Content: This is the first 120hz TV I have purchased and it was well worth it. The initial setting looked too fluid and I have to dial down the motion flow to around 40%. I like that this feature was available. Frankly anything over 120hz is a joke, your eye can't tell the difference. The remote was easy to use and the picture quality was very good. It is very stylish and has touch sensitive control on the front that are integrated into the bezel. The only down side was that this TV is bright, almost too bright, which leads to backlight bleedthrough, and thus blacks that arent as black as I would like them to be. You may say "just turn down the backlight", while this partially remedies the issue, when you turn down the back light you run into contrast issue and mess up the colors which the TV is programmed to produce at a the factory present brightness level.All this being said, a sound 46' LCD TV with true 120 HZ performance, above average picture quality, Samsung reliability, all for $900.00... basically, a good deal!FYI: It accepts usb drives and dual usb Hard Drives and will play content upto 1080p from many sources such as: MKV, AVI, MP4, MP3, MOV*, and DIVX (I believe)Picture Quality: 89%Design: 90%Inputs: 100%

Reviews.Content: This is our second Samsung and we just love it.  What a beautiful picture!Very easy to set up too.

Reviews.Author: GSH
Reviews.Content: I've had 2 of these tvs both purchased NEW from Amazon in hopes of getting a one that works correctly.  The problem with the 1st unit was the picture was too dark even with the backlight cranked up to max and the brightness really high.  The problem with the 2nd unit is a common problem among samsung hdtvs backlights interfering with the infared remotes to cable boxes, dvd players etc.  In short, it renders them useless and unable to change the channels and other functions on the box tops..Do your homework and do google search for "samsung ir interference with cable boxes".There's a reason why there are 20-30 used ln46c630 for sale on amazons warehouse deals. Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I bought this hdtv back in march and looks great to this day. Picture and sound quality are great, altough colors did seem more bright in store but, overall im satisfied with it and couldnt ask for anymore. The only bad thing I can point out about this tv is the power button on the tv itself, I touch it several times and it does not turn ON or OFF it must have been defected. The only way I can get the tv to turn on is if I literally add quite a bit of pressure with my thumb which is a bit annoying when I cant find the control. Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Mac Chin "Sidsational"
Reviews.Content: Best bang for your buck and Consumer Reports agrees. It's simple, if you want a no fuss - don't really need the 3D, LED thinness or no internet then this TV is for you. I've been using this TV since last August and so far it has held up well.I chose the white glove option at no additional cost. Delivery guy didn't have the white gloves on, but he was able to set up the TV in about 15 minutes.Picture quality is sharp and when the AutoMotion Plus is on, the image is very life like. The image processor on this TV is very powerful. Like most other users have reported, there is the panel lottery. I have an AA02 panel and for the first months in my old dark apartment, I did notice clouding. In my new apartment which is very sunny, I don't notice the clouding as much. I am very grateful that the 46" C630 series comes with a matte screen.Some niggles would be that the screen bezel could be thinner, wished it came with built-in internet and have noticed some audio syncing issues, but hey, again, what you get for the price you pay can't be beat.Looks wise, the unit is very elegant. The C630 does have TouchofColor, but it is a very subtle charcoal gray (I can't stand the red/blue lights or the copper strip on this year's model, the D630)For gaming, I haven't really noticed any lag. Connected my PS3, change the HDMI output to Game mode and have been gaming lag free.DVD's look sharp and Blu-rays look amazing - make sure you have the unit set to do 1080p/24.Lastly, I have hooked my desktop PC to act as a HTPC. To connect, you must use either the 15 pin D-sub VGA or the DVI that is on HDMI 1. I used the amazon cable AmazonBasics HDMI to DVI  Adapter Cable (9.8 Feet / 3.0 Meters) to hook it up. As DVI-D does not carry the audio signal, you must use a 3.5mm audio cable and connect the cable into the Audio input on the back of the TV from the PC. From there, select DVI PC on the HDMI 1 info tab on the TV and you are good to go! Be fore warned - using the resolution of 1920 x 1080 on your desktop will make things very small and hard to read. You can make the icons and the font size bigger, but I've decided to give up on using the HTPC as a regular PC.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: stylish look and quality picture !!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630 - Great TV at a great price!

Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent, easy to set up and use. Great buy for the price ($899). I would definitely purchase again. My only complaint is the 'Super Saver' delivery service (CEVA) leaves a lot to be desired. The TV shipped about two days after I placed the order and I received it 7 days after that. Reviews.Title: Great price on a terrific product
Reviews.Author: S. Jones
Reviews.Content: I've been researching flat screen TVs for over 2 years, trying to decide which TV had the best reviews for picture quality and durability and would fit my needs most closely.  I'm not a big TV watcher but I do want a clean picture and easy accessibilty when I do use the TV.  The 46" Samsung 630 series fits perfectly.  It was easy to set up and hook up, looks nice in my home without taking over the whole room and the picture is very crisp and clear.  The delivery company was on time for their delilvery appointment and extremely helpful.  They offered to set it up, but since I wasn't quite ready to set it up permanently, I opted to set it up myself - easy-peasy!  I'm truly enjoying the purchase and the price was more than right!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: handsome7
Reviews.Content: This TV is great and looks good even in a sunny room. I've had it for a few weeks now and so far there has been no problem. It does generate some heat but that's not as much as a CRT.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia W
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about 3 weeks now and I LOVE it!!!  The only feature Idon't understand is the allshare - I hooked it up to a cat 5 cable and nothing happened-- but the picture is outstanding and I am even impressed with the sound. Delivery was awesome, got it from amazon and got free white glove delivery.

Reviews.Title: Super TV
Reviews.Author: Da' Teach
Reviews.Content: I put this TV on my back porch and hooked it up to the satellite receiver.  Beautiful picture and easy to set up.  No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price, couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: mtea
Reviews.Content: Searched for a while to purchase my first LCD-TV.  I am very happy I went with the Samsung rather than the Vizio as the quality of the build from an appearance standpoint as well as tv functionality and picture quality.  If you are on the fence about this TV and it falls in line with your budget you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Croce "ncMike"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before making my new TV purchase and kept coming back to the LN46C630.  I couldn't be happier with the purchase!  Great pic quality, plenty of HDMI connections and easy to use.  My only complaint is the sound (which I was aware of) and that's no big deal.  Wasn't ready for the full surround system yet, so went with a nice soundbar and am very happy with that too...

Reviews.Title: Wow--great picture!
Reviews.Author: David C. Veeneman
Reviews.Content: I just finished setting up this TV. Setup was simple, and the picture is fabulous. Easily twice as good as my old rear-projection HDTV, and much better than a smaller HDTV I use in my bedroom. I am using this TV with a Samsung BD-C6500 1080p Blu-ray Disc Player, and the two work beautifully together.

Reviews.Title: enjoying new tv
Reviews.Author: J. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Checked for the best price on this tv and was at Amazon. Mounted on wall and looks great in my bedroom. My second tv purchase from Amazon. Also bought LG 32 in. mounted on wall in kitchen. Best buys for quality products.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Daniel Nelson
Reviews.Content: Like most people I spent many many hours reviewing tv's. I would have liked an LED but just wasn't in my price range. Also would have liked a 55in but again not in my price range.I had narrowed it down to this and the Sony EX500. They were very close and there was very little real difference between them for my needs. So I ended up basing the decision on the better deal on shipping I got on the Samsung.Overall I'm very happy with the purchase. Its a beautiful TV and I love watching Blurays, Upscaled dvd's via my PS3 or playing PS3 games. Netflix via the PS3 looks great on the screen as long as you take into account whatever the source is. Some of Netflix's selection isn't in HD but overall its all good.I payed about a grand for this TV with shipping and at the time of purchase considered it a great deal and great quality for the money.Definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: David A. Long
Reviews.Content: A fantastic TV with great features. Samsung connect works pretty cool. Probably better if wired rather than wireless.Picture quality is great. A+++

Reviews.Title: LN46C630
Reviews.Author: John L. Woodham
Reviews.Content: I had to return the TV because I could not fit the picture to the screen.  Samsung would not help because it was purchased from a third party.  The instruction manual did not address the problem.  Amazon does not have technical assistance.  I now know that my input signal had to be changed.  I have just purchased a LN46C550 that works fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture...Poor and Slow Delivery Service
Reviews.Author: Brian L. Root "broot1967"
Reviews.Content: The TV looks great and is the perfect size for my upstairs family room.  I believe the 55" would have been too much and would have dominated the space.However, the delivery service from Pilot etal left much to be desired. I ordered the LN46C630 on 11/26/10 and was given an estimated delivery date of 12/6/10 to be delivered by Pilot.  After not hearing even so much as a peep out of the delivery service by 12/7/10, I decided to initiate a call to check the status.  The customer service representitive was very polite, but all she wanted to do was pass me off to a secondary delivery agent.  I contacted the secondary delivery agent (out of Kansas City) whom informed me that they had received the TV on Friday, December 3rd, but they claimed it was too late in the day to get the TV on the truck that for the next Monday's deliveries to Wichita.  I asked what kind of service to expect, and they stated the deilvery persons would bring the TV into the house, unbox it, plug it in to test it to make sure it worked.  Needless to say since the TV didn't make it on the truck or deliveries to Wichita for the week of December 6th, it didn't get delivered that week.  The secondary delivery agent stated they only send one truck per week to my location and it would be another week before I would receive delivery. On Monday, December 13th, I finally got a call from the secondary delivery agent...AT 9pm AT NIGHT.  They wanted to deliver the TV that night.  I said no way that they would have to deliver in the morning, but couldn't tell me when.  They called back even later that night at stated they would deliver at 7am in the morning on Tuesday, December 14th.  I agreed, but the next morning I got a call from the delivery guy at 7am and he stated he was across town and would be there in about a half hour.  So, I finally received delivery on Tuesday, December 14th at 7:30am...or 8 days after my delivery date.  However, when they delivered it they just brought it in the door and literally set it down 2 feet in inside the door.  Then they expected me to sign for it in two places...one place stated that I recieved it and another signature stipulated that it was delivered undamaged.  I told them I wasn't going to sign that is was delivered undamaged unless they unboxed it and proved to me that is wasn't cracked or damaged in any way.  They didn't even offer to unbox it.  I had to unbox it myself while they stood there.  I lifted the TV out of the box and looked it over then begrudingly signed that I received it undamaged.  Then I told the delivery guys that their customer service representitive stated that they would plug it in and make sure that it worked.  However, the delivery guy stated that the TV was on a freezing cold truck all night and that it should NOT be plugged in and turned on until the TV had a chance to warm up to room temperature.  After all of the delays and poor delivery service, I have begun to question if Amazaon is properly vetting the delivery companies or if they are just going for the cheapest to deliver agents.

Reviews.Title: good buy for under $850
Reviews.Author: daemon "DMen"
Reviews.Content: Others have commented on features, however didn't see much on playing videos hosted on a PC to TV over a LAN. The sharing of various videos (e.g., different formats, .flv, .ts, dvd) is ok. You must install PC Share Manager (PSM) downloaded from Samsung (go to Support and enter in data for the tv, etc) on PC, share all folders on the PC containing the videos you want to play, launch PSM to select the folders of interest, select db refresh, with TV remote control select DLNA which lists manager then select video of interest. There are other ways to play videos which are covered in the user manual.Only a power cable is provided -- you must have all other cables. There is a flyer for a Holder-TV to help anchor the tv to the wall, but it wasn't found.It took installer about 5-8 minutes to mount the tv onto the stand, and do quick setup. The unit was ordered 11-27, and arrived on 12-7.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv!
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: The Tv is fabulous! It has great picture quality and sound! I've only had it about a month now, but no problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Caroline Lim
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I bought this tv. The picture quality is so much better than the previous tv I owned.

Reviews.Title: SO glad I bought this!
Reviews.Author: J. Yorek
Reviews.Content: To be honest, I don't know how good the TV's speakers sound because I have the sound running through my home theater system.  I gave the sound quality 5 stars though because everything else about the thing is fantastic!  Super easy to set up, it took about 15 minutes to get everything plugged in and connected to my computer and to my stereo.  The picture is awesome, the color is out of this world, and all of my friends who have seen it say that it's one of the best TV's they've seen.The only issue that I've had (the reason I gave "Reliability" 4 stars) is that sometimes when I put my computer to sleep and turn it back on, the sound doesn't go through.  It could very well be a computer or other technical issue (dunno because I'm not a tech-savvy guy).  All in all, though, it's been a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great looking TV but poor packaging
Reviews.Author: Stephen D. Oliver "Average Steve"
Reviews.Content: Last night we received our eagerly awaited TV (Samsung LN46C630 46-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV (Black) our first flat panel in the home). As I removed it from the packaging, to my astonishment, the FACE i.e., the GLASS SCREEN of the TV WAS NOT PROTECTED!! Instead, they have foam "corners" for each corner of the TV that apparently are supposed to stabilize the TV in transit; however, there is NO protection for the face of the TV (there is a thin, almost see-through sheet of foam to protect from scratching).Well, guess what? My TV was cracked--and I mean BADLY. Like a jigsaw puzzle. After I got over the initial "Oh no!!" I was panicked that I'd be hassled for returning it. To Amazon's credit, they have ordered a new (not refurbished) replacement due here next week. That said, this experience put the fear in me. It has only further increased my apprehension at making large purchases like this from an online vendor. I'm looking at purchasing a SquareTrade Warranty based on the reviews I've seen here.I'm a convinced Samsung customer (for now) based on looking at their TVs for over a year now and I'm sure they're no dummies, but I just can't believe these large TVs are shipped like that.

Reviews.Title: PLEASE READ THIS before you buy this TV
Reviews.Author: Bucs Anthem
Reviews.Content: For all of you who are on the fence, take this into mind.....YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!With that being said, there is a reason why this TV was almost $1200 a few months ago, and now it is being offered at $899 in most local retail stores.....and....Do you want to know the reason why???Just google "Samsung stutter" or "Samsung flicker" for LCD TVs.Hey.....I just tried this TV out....and I was being skeptical.  Because let's be honest, there's alot of people out there that give reviews, but have no clue what they are talking about.There is a problem with certain models that Samsung has put out, and this is one of them.The problem that happens, is that if your Samsung TV seems like it's "blurry" or the picture seems like it's "stuttering" like it cannot catch up or it "flickers" simliar to what a candle does, it's NOT your eyes deceiving you.It's NOT - your video sourceIt's NOT - your HDMI cablesIt's NOT - your equipment you useIt's the TV.....plain and simple.Vary rarely should any TV do this unless, it is those items mentioned above.The Samsung company will not acknowledge the fact that there is something faulty with their TVs when it does this, and that is why there is a huge class action lawsuit against them.I personally have a four year old 46 inch samsung that I bought and that I love.  In year three of having the TV, the capacitors went bad and I started having purple dots on my screen and it would take forever to start up.  I called up samsung and they sent a tech out and replaced the capacitors for free.  It was so fast, that it took the tech longer to unscrew all the bolts from the back of the TV than it was to replace the capacitors.My only guess, it that with certain models of Samsung TVs, there's some kind of "chip" or "video processing" problems associated with the boards they use inside certain TVs they produce.Do I hate Samsung - NOI wanted to keep the TV, but I couldn't because of all those issues stated above.A long time eletronics store salesman told me "When buying samsung TVs, it's either hit or miss.  Some customers never have problems with them, other have problems one-by-one, like a waterfall effect".So.....GO AHEAD....buy it!!!!Your getting a "Great Deal"......and then when you start experiecing problems down the road with it, remember.....You've been warned.Good Luck!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Beter than expected
Reviews.Author: John R. Kipp "keykipp"
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervious ordering a big breakable product online but everything worked out great. Delivery was delayed a few days because of our remote location ( Key West ) but we are used to that.The TV arrived right after the driver called to schedule the drop off. Unpacking and setup were easy even for a geezer like me. I'm glad I did a lot of research  on CNET.com that helped getting the right set for my room size and all the features I wanted.John K

Reviews.Title: Great LCD
Reviews.Author: J.Rivera
Reviews.Content: Excellent lcd tv for the price.  Tons of features and the picture quality will blow you away.  Get it, you wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv all around
Reviews.Author: Jon D. Vanslyke
Reviews.Content: This is my second samsung tv. The picture is as good as any out there. The sound is great for tv speakers.  Top quality all around.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture.  Bad Sound
Reviews.Author: P. Tu
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Bad sound.  I connect the external audio output to a PYLE amp, also from Amazon.  Then the sound is amazing.  Delivery is bad.  I was told the TV would arrive in the afternoon between 3 and 4pm.  Did not arrive until 10pm.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Smith
Reviews.Content: After having researched the LCD 1080P marketplace extensively, I decided on the Samsung and have not been disappointed. My initial experience, as well as my prior experience with a number of Samsung products makes me confident this will prove to be an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Martin Shultz
Reviews.Content: I made this purchase based off the reviews from CNET and Consumer Reports.  I must say I'm not disappointed, great picture, good sound, at a good price.Hard to beat too when you get free shipping to your door and no sales tax.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: bentley
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this tv and the amount of time it took to have it delivered.  I will continue to shop at amazon.com!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Norwin C. Hall
Reviews.Content: Every part of doing bussiness with Amazon has been super.have other products,never had a complaint.TV set delivered on time,and in good working order,the delivery men were great,and helpful.Would do it again,not the TV can't afford that,that was part of my bucket list,now back to trying to work a deal with Pam Andersonhe big C takes me.Have 5 Doctors working on me now,but guess it's better then one Coroner.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but NOT a matte screen!
Reviews.Author: Daryl Gates
Reviews.Content: Warning: despite many claims I have read in past reviews here which swayed me to buy this TV, it has a GLOSSY screen, NOT a matte screen, users have been inaccurately portraying this TV as matte which it is not.  During the day when you watch the TV you will get glare from nearby windows.  So be careful.  It's probably their "low-gloss" version which is not quite as bad as plasma that looks like a mirror, but be careful of the inaccurate reviews here.  Besides that the picture is excellent so have to rate it high because it's not Samsungs fault some people here write wrong reviews.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy a Samsung LCD TV (major defect)
Reviews.Author: M. Kim
Reviews.Content: google: samsung lcd tv pink dotsAlso, instead of reading reviews sorted by "most helpful" sort by most recent and you will see MANY similar problemsI purchased a brand new Samsung LCD TV in Jan 08 and the first year was great with no problems.  After about a year, I started encountering problems with it when I power it on.  I'll get these pink dots all over my screen, requiring me to turn it off, and then turn it back on numerous times.  It usually takes a good 5 minutes for normal picture quality.I've contacted customer service and they offered me NO help saying that it was out of warranty and they were not aware of this problem.  Considering how many people have filed complaints on here, the BBB, and other consumer groups, they should be more helpful with this common problem.Don't get me wrong, the picture quality is great and it would be a great tv if it worked.  But 2-3 years seems to be the average lifespan for Samsung LCD's, and that is not what I expected for $1000+.I'll never buy a Samsung TV again.

Reviews.Title: Power supply problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Sooner or later this TV will not turn on immediately.  You will have to wait 5 minutes or longer.  Use caution before you buy.  Type "samsung takes forever to turn on" into Google.  See how many posts there are regarding this issue.

Reviews.Title: My new Samsung 46 inch LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Gisela C Haines
Reviews.Content: Seemed like a good product to purchase,but unfortunately my Samsung went on the blink after 5 weeks. Will be repaired in 2 days, so after that I should be enjoying the large 46 inch with a good picture quality. For better sound I purchased a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: I'm satisfied. :D
Reviews.Author: n1mR0d1uX
Reviews.Content: I've been monitoring this tv's price for some time, and I'm glad I bought it just before it's price got up again. LolI have no complaints. Auto Motion Plus is pretty cool but if your eyes can't keep up, then turn it off. @_@Samsung was my first choice and I was NOT disappointed. :D

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: RileyCain
Reviews.Content: Works very well; excellent picture quality; sound could be better but fine for the small space; only real issue is cable tv pausing intermittently which is probably more of a cable company problem than the tv

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: S. Chaudhry
Reviews.Content: Just bought the TV from Bestbuy yesterday.  It was an open box and i got a pretty good deal.  The screen resolution is amazing.  I am really impressed by the sound as well.  I watched Quantum of Solace on it yesterday and the daytime scenes looked "Documentary style"... I guess i will need to get the TV calibration done.  Still trying to find some tips on internet.  This TV replaced a 32" old style TV in my bedroom and it is a huge upgrade.  I have a plasma in living room and this has far better resolution.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630 review
Reviews.Author: Pale
Reviews.Content: TV picture quality and clarity is OK, but not any better than lower cost units. The sound is horrendous. Very dificult to understand-sounds like its coming from a tin can. I can't fathom why a so called premium HDTV can have such horrible sound. We turn on the sound from our $99 13 inch no name Tv and turn off the sound of the Samsung. I not only paid a lot more for this supposedly premium TV, but now I have to also purchase a sound system the costs almost as much as the TV. Had I known this I would have purchased a lower cost HDTV and put the money saved into a sound system. Samsung you should be ashamed to put your name on this junk.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Craig Heuerman
Reviews.Content: Amazes me that the delivery company would deliver, or try to deliver a damaged product.Purchased this TV after reading the reviews. Waited over a week and thankfully I had it opened with the delivery guys still here. The screen was destroyed, looked like someone put a forklift arm thru it. If you order and use the Amazon set up make sure they open it before they go. I would have reorderd from Amazon but after waiting 10 days then the damaged set arrives they made no effort to get me another one any faster then another 10 days. Still have not seen my refund....I found the TV locally which made the family happySo for the TV, it is everything that all the other people have stated who rated it 5 STARS. The picture is fantastic. I had a Samsung DLP for 9 yrs and loved it, but this is hands down a better picture. In fact some shows and movies almost look fake because the picture on the set is so good. Not sure if that makes sense but that's the only way I can think to describe it.Tons of picture adujustment so I have a lot to work with but out of the box it's fantastic. No issue with glare as some have mentioned but the room it is in does not get direct sun. The sound seems decent but I only listened for a short time before I hooked up to my sound system. All in all I am totally happy with my choice..

Reviews.Title: Picture sometimes looks fake
Reviews.Author: JGrath "JGrath"
Reviews.Content: I think the 120 Hz technology is at fault as to why I don't like the tv.  Particularly movies that are on tv channels looked very fake on this tv.  It looked more like you are watching actors on a stage than a movie.  It's hard to explain but once I got the tv and noticed the problem I googled the fakeness of the picture and found a lot of other people complaining.  I talked to a guy at Best Buy and he agreed that he had a 120Hz tv and he turns that feature off because he doesn't like it either.  So why buy the "newer technology" if you are just going to disable it.  Save yourself some money and get a 60 Hz tv.  I'm returning this one and getting a 60 Hz.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: C. Hall
Reviews.Content: The TV indicates that is 120 HZ, but it has 60 HZ printed on the label. After talking with a customer service rep, the company is investigating why this is so, but gave no explanation. Also, most HDMI cables are only rated for 60 HZ so it must transform the signal into 120 HZ which causes changes in the picture. Overall good choice.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv was great at first didnt even last one year -green screen
Reviews.Author: RICHARD
Reviews.Content: well got the tv didnt use it right awy becuase we were moving to a new house ,when we moved to new house ,set it up worked great about 11 months in started to get a green screen images ,until final got to the point ,couldn't watch it again ,almost solid green screen ,and i found out through research ,it quite common with samsug tv's il  never buy one again ,my old sears tv lasted me 15 years ,this one just over one year and payed a pretty pennie for it

Reviews.Title: Quality Issue
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: As I was one of the early buyers, the shipping took some time. The problem with the piece was that the LCD screen remained blank after switching the TV on. I called Samsung Support, who registered the complaint and confirmed that someone from technical support will call and set up an appointment. But their tech support never called back. I then called up Amazon and requested a replacement. Amazon support confirmed that this product can be replaced for no charge but due to a bug in their system they are unable to order a replacement. I then asked them to cancel the order. The shipping agency is a little inflexible in terms of pickup timing. They work 5 days a week and I had to stay home on the day of pickup. The refund was processed promptly.The good thing about this product is that its rated for 110V~240V and therefore can work across geographies.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, BUT two years later...
Reviews.Author: Brendan John
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tv which arrived via courier service (Pilot) a week after my purchase. The delivery service was very good and arrived on time and setup the tv. The TV is stylish but I am dissapointed in the settings. They seem to be many and complicated to figure out. The movies and cable channels seem to look like a soap opera or just weird. After adjusting some settings I was able to change the settings so that the picture looked normal.Good TV overall.Less than 2 yrs after I purchased, the TV backlight seems to be dimming every now and then. Not cool!No warranty on the product

Reviews.Title: Wrong stand in package
Reviews.Author: M. Sturm
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this tv if you plan to use it on the stand.  Amazon will only mail out a new tv and not just the missing part.  It is a hassle to deal with their delivery service that only works mon-fri during the work day.The other option is to have Samsung replace the part as part of their warranty.  It has been two weeks and I am still waiting for the part.  Samsung warranty service has been horrible to deal with.  Every time I talk with them, I get a different story on when the part will be shipped out.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46C630
Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: This TV lacks a number of features.  The sound is really poor, using built-in speakers.  I called Samsung complaining about poor sound, they didn't like hearing it. Poor AVC...audio volume goes weak then strong and never the same strength when changing channels.  One reason for poor sound, Samsung says, is internal speakers face backward, so if you have TV up against wall, sound hits wall. If they know this, why don't they mount them forward...?  Owners instruction manual is absurdly poor.  Written on cheap paper, small draft-quality text, poor descriptions, and ridiculously inferior setup information.  Shame on Samsung.  (This set is made in Mexico.....that explains a lot ! ).  If you want good owner manuals, look to Panasonic, Visio, Toshiba, etc...but not Samsung...!  The Samsung remote control is cramped & limited...! One good feature is picture quality and color tone when you use the 'Natural' setting....which is the closest thing to natural skin tone I've seen on any TV...and the sharpness is excellent....sharp, crisp, clear picture....just beautiful when watching the nature programs...!

Reviews.Title: Full-screen display problem
Reviews.Author: Jingjing Qiu "JQ"
Reviews.Content: Sound and picture quality looks great, but the picture is not in full-screen! there are two black strips on the top and bottom sides,and the display area of screen looks like a narrow band!

Reviews.Title: Price in cart no not till you click PLACE ORDER
